page.title: 18EDUCATION IN BROCKWORTH
page.content: The {school} has placed 2150 16 year olds on {work experience} since 1975. Pupils gain one week's experience in their choice of work. Within our survey-area only seven {employers} have taken our pupils - 2 farms, 1 haulage contractor, 1 garage workshop, 1 primary school, a manufacturer of timber doors and window frames (since closed down) and Prinknash Abbey. It is hoped this year that about 150 young people will be placed in a similar number of locations of work. Most employers are based in Gloucester Cheltenham, but some are at a far greater distance - the furthest being Southend in Essex. During the decade of the scheme, some 200 different employers have given their help to the school in offering places to 5th formers.
